newsitem.title: CHINA: China's Maanshan says to shift workforce.
newsitem.headline: China's Maanshan says to shift workforce.

text.p: China's Maanshan Iron and Steel Company Ltd plans to shift several thousand workers into other jobs this year, a company spokesman said.

Maanshan Iron and Steel, which has H shares listed in Hong Kong and A shares for domestic investors in Shanghai, was setting a target of more than a 15 percent reduction of its workforce during the year, the spokesman told Reuters.
The figure was merely a target and would not necessarily be reached, the spokesman said by telephone from the company headquarters in Maanshan city in central Anhui province.
The move would not reduce the payroll because these workers would be shifted to other jobs within the company, he said.
"We don't need so many workers for steel production," he said.
"But we will find other jobs for them. They will not be out on the street," he said.
He did not specify what other roles would be found for the workers.
